verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Brothers, come: Sisters, come Worship Lord Jesus Put aside all that divides Come worship the Lord. Sing Him praises, all His people{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Brothers come: Sisters come Worship the Lord. Go and live the life He gives: Worship Lord Jesus As we grow, our love will show We worship the Lord.{/lang-eng}
